document_data.caption: A map showing the Forcebar and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Forcebar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Forcebar''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Forcebar was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road originated on the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] where it branched due east, ending on [[Tezambril's Street]] after a short distance. [[Anchoret's Alley]] branched south off of the Forebar's western side.
document_data.History: The road was originally named as it was designed with defense in mind. If Waterdeep was ever invaded the plan was to block strategic points on roads with rock magically transported from the [[Ethereal plane]].
